squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx

Class ButtonsPanel.PreAllocatedPanels<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
        • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.GroupCombinedPanel<T>
          • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.ButtonsPanel<T>
            • squidpony.squidgrid.gui.gdx.ButtonsPanel.PreAllocatedPanels<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, squidpony.panel.ICombinedPanel<T>
    Enclosing class:
    ButtonsPanel<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract static class ButtonsPanel.PreAllocatedPanels<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>
extends ButtonsPanel<T>
    A convenience subclass for people that give preallocated ISquidPanels. A single abstract method remains to be implemented: what to do when a button is pressed, i.e. ButtonsPanel.selectedButton(int).
    Author:
    smelC

      • buildPanel

        protected squidpony.panel.ISquidPanel<T> buildPanel(int width,
                                                    int height)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: ButtonsPanel
        This method can be left unimplemented if you give the panels at construction time (constructor ButtonsPanel.ButtonsPanel(ISquidPanel, ISquidPanel, List).
        Specified by:
        buildPanel in class ButtonsPanel<T extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color>
        Parameters:
        width - The width that the panel must have.
        height - The height that the panel must have.
        Returns:
